Description:
If true, the application will open in full-screen mode.

*This is a boolean value*

If true, the 'Send To' option will be enabled in the Files menu. The 'Send To' menu is the same as that when you right click on a file in Windows Explorer. This can be used to send the files to other apps, like Windows Fax and Scan or Telegram. Currently, WhatsApp does not provide a Send To option - one can request for the feature by writing a mail to them.

*This feature may not work properly.* The 'Send to' feature cannot send files to the Desktop, Documents or other folders because of some ambiguity in the working of this feature.

*Only on Windows*

*This is a boolean value*

Choose what happens when you double-click on an item on the list of Assignments. Choose only a valid callback from the below table. In case the callback is invalid, app defaults to ``view_current_record``.

Choose what happens when you press Enter when an item on the list of Assignments is selected. Choose only a valid callback from the below table. In case the callback is invalid, app defaults to ``open_current_record``.

Choose what happens when you assign a tag to as assignment using the View Tags dialog. Choose only a valid callback from the below table. In case the callback is invalid, app defaults to ``refresh_treeview``.

Choose which columns to display in the List of Assignments on the home screen. You can choose from the following:

* ``assignment.id`` - The system-assigned number of the assignment.
* ``asssignment.name`` - The name of the assignment
* ``assignment.uidentifier`` - The UID [1]_ of the assignment alone.
* ``assignment.type`` - The type of the assignment
* ``tutor.id`` - The ID of the tutor
* ``tutor.name`` - The name of the tutor
* ``tutor.uidentifier`` - The UID [1]_ of the tutor alone.
* ``subject.id`` - The subject ID
* ``subject.name`` - The name of the subject
* ``subject.desc`` - The description of the subject
* ``subject.uidentifier`` - The subject UID [1]_
* ``.assignment.uidentifier`` - Subject UID, Tutor UID, Assignment UID concatenated by a / character.

Choose which columns to display in the List of Tutors in the New Assignment dialog box. You can choose from the following:

* ``tutor.id`` - The ID of the tutor
* ``tutor.name`` - The name of the tutor
* ``tutor.uidentifier`` - The UID [1]_ of the tutor alone.
* ``subject.id`` - The subject ID
* ``subject.name`` - The name of the subject
* ``subject.desc`` - The description of the subject
* ``subject.uidentifier`` - The subject UID [1]_
* ``.tutor.uidentifier`` - Subject UID, Tutor UID concatenated by a / character.

Choose which columns to display in the Subjects tab. You can choose from the following:

* ``subject.id`` - The subject ID
* ``subject.name`` - The name of the subject
* ``subject.desc`` - The description of the subject
* ``subject.uidentifier`` - The subject UID [1]_
* ``.tutor.uidentifier`` - Subject UID, Tutor UID concatenated by a / character.
